name: PinataniP
description:
Eat candy. Become a herd. But don’t get hit.

Have you ever wanted to be a piñata? Well it doesn't matter, because you are one now.

But the life of a piñata isn't easy.

Once created only to be destroyed at the hands of children with sticks, piñatakind has finally decided to take a stand.

Go forth, multiply, and survive.

Credits

TekNek Games

vaarinia, tsukiyakii, SpeedySnails
